Package unit

Class CrewMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • unit.Unit
      • unit.CrewMember
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Actioneer, Builder, Explorer, Hungus, Medic, Sleeper
    public abstract class CrewMember
extends Unit

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int actions
      Number of actions left
      private int fatiqueLevel
      Current fatigue level of a crew member
      private boolean hasPlague
      Whether it has space plague
      private int hungerLevel
      Current hunger level of a crew member
      private int luck
      Luck stat of a crew member The higher it is, the more chance it has of finding a ship piece

    • Constructor Detail

      • CrewMember

        public CrewMember​(java.lang.String memberName,
                  int luckStat)
        Constructor for Unit
        Parameters:
        memberName - name of the new unit
        luckStat - unit's percentage chance of finding ship pieces, the higher the luckStat the more likely they will find a ship piece

      • CrewMember

        public CrewMember​(java.lang.String memberName,
                  int luckStat,
                  int actions)
        Constructor for a crew member This constructor will be called by the unit type subclasses
        Parameters:
        memberName - name of the unit
        luckStat - luck stat that a unit has
        actions - number of actions a unit has

      • searchPlanet

        public boolean searchPlanet()
        The crew member searches for ship pieces on the planet The probability they found one depends on their luck stat
        Returns:
        whether they found a ship piece or not

      • reduceAction

        public void reduceAction()
                  throws InsufficientActionException
        Reduces actions for a crew member by 1 Crew member has a minimum of 0 action and a maximum of 2. The method throws InsufficientActionError if it tries to reduce the action below 0.
        Throws:
        InsufficientActionException

      • refreshActions

        public void refreshActions​(int amount)
        refreshes a crew member's actions setting it back to the amount specified
        Parameters:
        amount - number of actions a crew member has
